alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 04 at 6:06PM EST until February 05 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and perhaps some sleet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches with little if any additional sleet accumulation. Storm total snowfall of 2 to 8 inches, Total sleet accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Coastal Washington and Coastal Hancock Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Power outages are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice will make travel extremely dangerous. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
